remaining_characters.name: Amelie
remaining_characters.description: Amelie has shoulder-length, wavy dark brown hair. She wears round, thin-rimmed glasses. Her outfit consists of a white button-down shirt, which is both classic and professional. The shirt has the sleeves rolled up slightly, adding a touch of casual ease to her attire. Amelie's expression is composed and confident, with a subtle, poised smile. She has a pair of small gold hoop earrings that add a hint of elegance to her appearance. The solid blue background enhances her features and attire, creating a professional and polished impression.

remaining_characters.name: Ann
remaining_characters.description: Ann has short, neatly styled dark brown hair that complements her professional appearance. She wears round, dark-framed glasses that add a touch of intellectual charm to her look. Her outfit consists of a white top with a subtle textured pattern, providing a clean and sophisticated aesthetic. Ann's expression is warm and composed, with a slight, friendly smile that conveys approachability and confidence. The solid blue background highlights her features and attire, creating a polished and professional impression.

remaining_characters.name: Diana
remaining_characters.description: Diana has long, straight, jet-black hair that cascades down her shoulders. She is wearing rectangular, thick-rimmed glasses that frame her face and contribute to her sophisticated look. Her attire consists of a light gray blazer with a subtle herringbone pattern, which she pairs with a light pink blouse, adding a touch of color and softness to her professional outfit. She has a warm and friendly smile, which, along with her slightly tilted pose, conveys approachability and confidence. The solid blue background enhances the focus on her, creating a polished and professional impression.

remaining_characters.name: Emilie
remaining_characters.description: Emilie has short, curly brown hair that frames her face in a lively and dynamic manner. She wears a pair of stylish, clear-framed glasses that add a modern and intellectual touch to her look. Her outfit consists of a simple yet elegant white turtleneck paired with a dark, cozy cardigan, which gives her a casual yet polished appearance. Emilie is also wearing dark pants, completing her understated and professional ensemble. Her expression is warm and friendly, with a slight smile that conveys approachability and confidence. The solid blue background provides a striking contrast to her dark clothing and enhances her overall presence in the image.

remaining_characters.name: Karen
remaining_characters.description: Karen has short, dark brown hair that is styled in soft waves, giving her a polished look. She wears a sleeveless royal blue dress with black lace detailing on the shoulders, which adds a touch of elegance to her appearance. Karen accessorizes with large, round blue earrings that complement her dress and a white smartwatch on her wrist. Her expression is friendly and confident, with a warm smile that conveys approachability. She stands with her arms crossed, exuding confidence and poise. The solid blue background enhances her features and attire, creating a cohesive and professional image.

remaining_characters.name: Lea
remaining_characters.description: Lea has shoulder-length, wavy black hair that frames her face beautifully. Her hair has a natural, tousled look, giving her a relaxed and approachable demeanor. She is dressed in a black sweater with white vertical stripes, which adds a touch of elegance and sophistication to her outfit. Lea's smile is warm and welcoming, and her slightly tilted pose with arms crossed adds an element of confidence and ease. The solid blue background highlights her features and attire, creating a professional and polished appearance.

remaining_characters.name: Sezen
remaining_characters.description: Sezen is a girl that has long, straight blond hair that is neatly styled, falling past her shoulders. She is wearing small gold hoop earrings that add a touch of elegance to her overall look. Her outfit consists of a light, silky blouse in a cream or champagne color, which is both stylish and professional. The blouse is buttoned up and has slightly puffed sleeves, giving a chic and polished appearance. Sezen's expression is composed and confident, with a slight, friendly smile. Her pose, with arms crossed, adds to her poised and self-assured demeanor. The solid blue background enhances her features and attire, creating a professional and clean impression.

remaining_characters.name: Laurence
remaining_characters.description: Laurence has shoulder-length, straight hair that is dark blonde with subtle highlights, giving her a warm and approachable look. She is wearing a soft, light green cardigan that adds a touch of coziness to her appearance. Underneath the cardigan, she wears a simple top, creating a casual yet polished outfit. Laurence accessorizes with a delicate necklace featuring a small pendant, adding a hint of elegance. Her expression is friendly and relaxed, with a gentle smile that enhances her approachable demeanor. The solid blue background provides a clean and professional contrast, making her stand out effectively.
